TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DriveListBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")]
[<System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")>]

summary.span: 使用户能够在运行时选择有效的磁盘驱动器。

span.span: Enables a user to select a valid disk drive at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此控件显示用户系统中所有有效驱动器的列表。Use this control to display a list of all the valid drives in a user's system. 您可以创建对话框，使用户能够从任何可用驱动器的磁盘上的文件列表中打开文件。You can create dialog boxes that enable the user to open a file from a list of files on a disk in any available drive. 如果还显示了 和 控件，则可以编写代码以将它们与 `DriveListBox` 控件和彼此同步。If you also display the and controls, you can write code to synchronize them with the `DriveListBox` control and with each other. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 控件使用的非托管资源，还可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a control and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，释放参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在释放参数设置为的情况调用 `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`. 当释放参数为时 `true` ，此方法将释放此控件引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时 ，请确保不引用以前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When you override , make sure not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 运行时获取或设置选定的驱动器。

span.span: Gets or sets the selected drive at run time.

value.span: 一个指定选定驱动器的 表达式。

span.span: A expression that specifies the selected drive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的有效驱动器 `Drive` 包括在运行时创建或刷新控件时在系统中出现的所有驱动器。The valid drives for the `Drive` property include all drives present in or connected to the system when the control is created or refreshed at run time. 属性的默认设置 `Drive` 为当前驱动器。The default setting of the `Drive` property is the current drive. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ComboBoxStyle DropDownStyle { System::Windows::Forms::ComboBoxStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ComboBoxStyle value); };
member this.DropDownStyle : System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指定 组合框样式的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the style of a combo box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DropDownStyle`属性控制向用户显示的接口。The `DropDownStyle` property controls the interface that is presented to the user. 您可以输入一个提供简单下拉列表框的值，列表始终显示在该下拉列表框中，其中的文本部分是不可编辑的，您必须选择一个箭头来查看下拉列表或默认下拉列表框（文本部分可编辑，并且用户必须按箭头键才能查看列表）。You can enter a value that provides a simple drop-down list box, where the list always appears, a drop-down list box, where the text portion is not editable and you must select an arrow to view the drop-down, or the default drop-down list box, where the text portion is editable and the user must press the arrow key to view the list. 若要始终显示用户不能编辑的列表，请使用 控件。To always display a list that the user cannot edit, use a control. 如果将属性设置 `DropDownStyle` 为 ，则只能从列表中选择有效的值。If you set the `DropDownStyle` property to , you can select only valid values from the list. 如果将属性设置 `DropDownStyle` 为 ，则可以在的可编辑区域中键入任何值 。If you set the `DropDownStyle` property to , you can type any value in the editable area of the . > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyvirtual instance void OnBackColorChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnBackColorChanged (e As EventArgs)
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnBackColorChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). `OnBackColorChanged`方法还使派生类可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The `OnBackColorChanged` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 当在 派生类中重写时，请确保调用 基类的方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, be sure to call the method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). `OnDrawItem`方法还使派生类可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The `OnDrawItem` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用 基类的方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure to call the method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 强制控件使其工作区无效并立即重绘自己。

span.span: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 当在 派生类中重写时，请确保调用 方法，以使控件及其子控件失效并重新绘制。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, make sure to call the method so the control and its child controls are invalidated and redrawn.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void WndProc (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m);
.method familyvirtual instance void WndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub WndProc (ByRef m As Message)
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void WndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed

param.name: m
param.span: 要处理的 Windows 消息。

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过方法筛选后，所有消息都将发送到 `WndProc` 方法 。All messages are sent to the `WndProc` method after being filtered through the method. `WndProc` 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。The `WndProc` method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅 [WindowProc 回调函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/legacy/ms633573(v=vs.85))。For more information about processing Windows messages, see [WindowProc callback function](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/legacy/ms633573(v=vs.85)). > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 继承控件应调用 基类的方法来处理其不处理的任何消息。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the method for the base class to process any messages that they do not handle.

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
